ingredients: 2 cups short-grain white rice or brown rice
3 cups water (4.5 cups for brown rice)
4 cups mixed vegetables (bok choy, snap peas, carrots, edamame)
4 cups fresh spinach or mixed greens
1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds for garnish
steps: Arrange crispy tofu, stir-fried vegetables, kimchi, fresh spinach, and cucumber slices in sections
Top with fried egg if using
Drizzle with reserved marinade (thinned with a bit of water if needed)
Garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds
title: Crispy Gochujang Tofu Bowls
